words.def: a drop of the clear salty saline solution secreted by the lacrimal glands
an adjustment made for the weight of the packaging in order to determine the net weight of the goods
a magnitude or frequency relative to a time unit
a period marked by distinctive character or reckoned from a fixed point or event
a beverage made by steeping tea leaves in water
any of various dark heavy viscid substances obtained as a residue
place (flax, hemp, or jute) in liquid so as to promote loosening of the fibers from the woody tissue
any of various long-tailed rodents similar to but larger than a mouse
a terrorist organization organized in 1959 by student activists who were dissatisfied with the moderate nationalism of the traditional Basque party
take in solid food
the sense organ for hearing and equilibrium
goddess of criminal rashness and its punishment
the products of human creativity
a unit of surface area equal to 100 square meters
a colorless and odorless inert gas
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
one.
